Summary: I looked up it was moving silently South to North a mile or so east of me.
divs: Sighting DetailsPutting the dogs out back door. As always was scanning the sky for something different. It was a white orb moving from South to North, slightly to my east. Moving with total silence. It seemed to be cruising pretty slow. It disappeared within 5 min.I have been seeing them for as long as I have been in the Highland Lakes Area, 30 years. I believe there to be an observing UFO Between Lake LBJ and Lake Travis, many years.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sunrise Beach Village
This sighting has never been favorited.
